BattleCardAbility.Desc: Restore 1 Light upon discarding this page\n[On Use] Restore 1 Light
[On Use] Gain 1 Haste next Scene; Gain 1 Cycle next Scene; If Speed is higher than the target's, all dice on this page gain +2 minimum roll value
[On Use] Gain 3 Cycle next Scene; Draw 1 page
Draw 1 page upon discarding this page\n[On Use] If user has Cycle, all dice on this page gain +1 Power
[On Use] Restore 1 Light; If Speed is 2 or lower, boost the minimum value of all dice on this page by 1
[On Use] Gain 1 Overheat next Scene
[On Use] Gain 2 Overheat next Scene
[On Use] Spend 2 Overheat to restore 3 Light
[On Use] Gain 1 Strength this Scene, inflict 3 Bind to self next Scene
[Single-use] [On Use] Take damage equal to Overheat on self * 5
[On Use] Spend all Overheat, gain 1 Strength and Endurance this Scene for every 2 Overheat spent; Immobilize self next Scene
[After Use] If neither of the dice on this page hit, take 7 Stagger damage
[On Use] Take 4 Stagger damage and draw 1 page
[On Use] Take 4 Stagger damage and restore 1 Light
[Combat Start] Give a random ally 1 Damage Up this Scene
[On Use] Take 7 Stagger damage
[On Use] Gain 1 Ink; restore 1 Light
[On Use] If Ink is lower than 5, gain 1 Ink; if Ink is 5 or higher, spend 2 Ink to draw 2 pages
[On Use] Spend 2 Ink to give all dice on this page +2 power
[On Use] Gain 2 Ink, if Ink is 7 or higher, take 7 Stagger damage to give 3 random allies 1 Damage Up next Scene
[On Use] Spend 5 Ink to give all dice on this page +2 Power and “[On Hit] Inflict 2 Ink”
[Combat Start] All enemies with Drowning gain Sinking this Scene equal to half their Drowning
[On Use] Inflict 1 Drowning to target and a random enemy
Dice on this page deal no damage [On Use] Add a copy of the first die on this page for every 5 Drowning on the manually selected target
[On Use] If target has 10 or more Drowning, all dice on this page gain +5 Power and inflict 5 Strangling Despair to all enemies on hit

This page cannot be redirected and targets an additional Speed Die on the target for every 5 Drowning they have [On Use] If target has 5 or more Drowning, all dice on this page gain “[On Hit] Inflict 1 Strangling Despair to 2 random enemies”

This page cannot be redirected and targets an additional Speed Die on the target for every 5 Drowning they have [On Use] If target has 5 or more Drowning, all dice on this page gain “[On Hit] Inflict 1 Strangling Despair to 2 random enemies”
[On Use] All dice on this page gain Power equal to target’s Drowning (Max +10)
[On Use] Inflict 3 Sinking and 1 Sinking Count next Scene for every 4 Drowning target has
[On Use] If target has 7 or more Drowning, all dice on this page gain +5 Power and inflict 2 Strangling Despair to all enemies
[Combat Start] For this Scene, all characters take no damage from attacks and Librarians gain 1 Sinking and Sinking Count this Scene upon taking a hit
[Combat Start] For this Scene, whenever an enemy uses a Combat Page, all dice on that page lose 1 Power for every 5 Sinking on self
[Combat Start] All enemies take damage equal to their Drowning and gain Sinking Count equal to 1/4th of their Drowning
[On Use] All dice on this page lose 5 power for every Drowning on self [After Use] If Drowning is 10 or higher, lose 10 Drowning
[On Use] All dice on this page lose 5 power for every Drowning on self [After Use] If Drowning is 10 or higher, lose 10 Drowning
Dice on this page deal no damage or Stagger damage
